website_summaries.verdict: An attractive, comfortable maxi dress that provides style at a bargain price.
pros: Completely sleeveless, so may not offer as much versatility as other maxi dresses
cons: Falls shorter than some prefer for a maxi dress, especially on taller bodies

customer_reviews.title: Great Maxi
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 dresses in different prints. I am not one to buy dresses and definitely not maxi dresses. However both of these are extremely comfortable and the patterns in person are adorable. For reference I am 5'5" 200lbs. I ordered a large based on the size chart for the breast measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So I have to say I looooove this dress, it's well worth the money. I ordered it in the size XL, I'm 5 foot 10, 240 pounds, I wear a size 20 in jeans, and am a 38 F in the bust, and the XL fits great. Stretchy thick material, not at all see through. And for me personally, the pattern I chose hides my belly fat well :) Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: alex mann

customer_reviews.title: Flattering!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress so much I bought three of them in different colors. It is very flattering for my belly. I'm 5'8, B cup, 185 lbs (mostly in belly and thighs), size 14 pants - bought XL, probably could do a L if I didn't need the length. The only con is it is hand wash only, which is why I gave it 4 stars. I have only worn once and haven't hand washed yet, so I can't comment on how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: LindsayGBP

customer_reviews.title: Just bought another one!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So cute that I just ordered another color!!!! I'm 5'8 and it comes to the right ankle height (not to high but not to the floor). I ordered a medium - I wear a 36D bra and the top of this dress fits perfect, it's stretchy but not thin and see through. I weigh 155 and it's not to loose around the waist so I dont look like I'm wearing a trash bag. The material on the bottom of the dress is flowing and not see through. Super cute and worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Van Hammer

customer_reviews.title: 36c=order a medium
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium due to my bra size 36C. It fits perfect. It is a bit short, if you are any taller than 5'5 I would say it's going to be too short for you. I'm using this as a maternity dress and at 5 months there's plenty of room for belly growth.
customer_reviews.author: Whostine16

customer_reviews.title: I went with the x-large and I'm glad I did because it fits just about perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 ft 6 and a 38DD and I was going back and forth between getting a large or a x-large. I went with the x-large and I'm glad I did because it fits just about perfectly. The top might be a little bit small because of my breast size, but everywhere else fits perfect. Would recommend to future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for pear shape
customer_reviews.text: Third time buying this dress (obviously different colors). It is so flattering on a pear shape. Love it. I'm 5'2 140 and the small fits well (might even be a little big). If you're super tiny, you probably shouldn't buy this. The dress touches the floor for me.
customer_reviews.author: missgordTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dress!! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2 and 165 lbs (unfortunately). I ordered a large. This dress is very comfortable and was mostly flattering. It would look better if my love handles were smaller which I'm working on losing some weight. So that's nothing against the dress. It almost covers my feet while I'm standing straight for anyone wondering about length. I think it could be casual or dressy depending on accessories. I don't wear dresses often but I do really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: This is my 4th dress. 3 were great, this one not so much.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth order. I kept re-ordering because these dresses are moderately priced and really beautiful. They don’t wrinkle, I can dress up or down by adding a jacket or even a short sleeve shirt over it. This particular dress was completely different than the others. The fabric was clingy and shiny. All other dresses were made from the same material, this dress looked cheap and different from the others. This dress did not arrive in the same ziplock like package like the others. It looked like it was repackaged and previously returned by someone else. I returned it as well. This purchase was a flop but the other dresses I bought from the same seller are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: God Is Everywhere

customer_reviews.title: The seller was wonderful about allowing me to return it and processed my ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium and it was slightly large and a tiny bit too short. I'm 5'7" 140lbs. The seller was wonderful about allowing me to return it and processed my refund quickly. The dress is a lovely material and very well made. If I was an inch or two shorter I'm sure a size small would've been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: love&light

customer_reviews.title: Lovely dress
customer_reviews.text: This dress is beautiful. I put it on as soon as I opened it! I am 230 pounds and 5'4. I ordered an XXL. It fit well in bust (DDD) and was the perfect length for me. I wore it with flat sandals. There is a little bit of length to play with, but be weary if you are taller than 5'6/5'7. The material is nicer than expected. The bottom is heavier cotton, while the top is a softer thinner cotton (not see through thin). Also. As other reviewers mention, the top is blue and not real as described.
customer_reviews.author: Smarie

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty maxi
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dress. I should have ordered a size smaller. 5'-7", 136, 32D. The top is double layered and the skirt is nice and flowy but not see through. Great quality at a very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great color
customer_reviews.text: I love that this dress just fits so perfect. It’s not to tight around the waist and yet it’s not loose up top where your bra keeps showing through on the sides like many dresses do at least for me. I LOVE the colors and pattern and love that it goes down to my ankles. It all around fits just perfect and feels nice to wear especially during these hot Florida days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A tad short for tall gals. Easy fix to knot it cutely for a casual look.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’8.5” so I had expectations of it being short but I’m okay with it because I like it knotted. This can be dressed up or casual with a jean jacket and a belt. The color I got isnt see thru but I would prefer to wear a slip with it as I haven’t worn it out yet and curious to see it is in daylight. Very soft and comfy. This dress is so gorgeous and the price is perfect just wish the length came in options when ordering. I plan to wear it in spring to nice restaurants on the beach. Can’t wait!
customer_reviews.author: Andreal85

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: First, I love the design of this dress, BUT I am extremely disappointed in the quality. I always wash new clothing, the top part of the dress pilled after the first wash. I mean sure I knock around in the house with it on, but definitely not going out, the top part looks worn, like I have had it forever. I have clothing from 10 years ago that look newer.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure what size to buy so I read the reviews before purchasing. Most people say it’s super stretchy (and it is), so I went with the smaller size, L. I got it and it was way smaller than I expected. The length was great. Returned it and got the XL. It fit better, but it is definitely shorter that the first dress. It’s a super comfy dress. The fabric is nicer than I expected for the price. It’s a good weight fabric, not too thin, even when stretched. I would buy again. I wish they had shorter dresses, too!
customer_reviews.author: D_12

customer_reviews.title: I love this dress
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress! I'm 5'2", 115 pounds and a small fits me like a glove with wedge heels. I've received a ton of compliments about this dress today. The material is a perfect balance of not too light and not too heavy; I feel as comfortable as if I was wearing sweatpants. I just hope it washes ok!
customer_reviews.author: AlliRo

customer_reviews.title: Great dress!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is so cute! I got the orange sleeveless one, and it fits me perfectly. The dress length falls right at the ankles. The top stretches across my chest just right, and let's the empire waist start a bit higher. The pattern is ideal for my apple shape. The skirt is diff material than the top, and feels a bit cheap polyester, but its loveable bc of how cute it is and how well it fits. It will work great for casual or summer dressing up a bit. I'm 5'3", 240 lbs, 38E
customer_reviews.author: OneAmongMany

customer_reviews.title: BEST DRESS EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress! It's comfortable and beautiful! I am 5'7 190lbs with 38DDD and the XL fits great! If my "girls" weren't as big then I could 100% get away with a Large. I ordered the black and taupe option and I love it. The skirt part is a liiiiitle see through. Not awful, but don't wear full or super colorful underwear! I'm wearing a pair of black yoga shorts under my dress and it's perfect! :)
customer_reviews.author: LJF

customer_reviews.title: Hubby and bloated tummy approved!
customer_reviews.text: Fits true to size. I run between a 6/8. I'm a super small waist but have a larger tummy. The elastic fits well and is not suffocating and stretched nicely. I'm 5'2 and length is perfect when wearing flats. Color is bright and fabric is soft and so far has been very durable and stretchy. I pair my dress with a teal belt and people love it. Hubby's new favorite dress "because it's so soft to touch you and you look so good"
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing work dress! It has a nice weight to it, not too thin. The top is not thin so you cannot see through it- any color bra can be worn under it. Also the design on the bottom is symmetrical and also not see-through when you stand in the sun. Great for teaching. So comfortable. I am 5’4” 165, and the L fits perfect, the bottom hem hits the top of my foot. Could ask for a better work outfit!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Plecenik

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this dress. Fits true to size and is perfect. I got a medium and i am 5' 6" and it hits right at the top of the feet. The colors in the flowers are so vibrant and exactly as pictured! Will order more! My particular pattern is not see through, however i could see how the lighter ones could be. BUT just get a "slip short" to wear under it! it is like a slip but shorts. You can get them anywhere- even on amazon! i have so many pairs that i wear under all of my dresses! That way, you wont have to miss out on wearing these GORGEOUS dresses!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Toney

customer_reviews.title: Short for heels
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress especially for the price. I'm so small that finding dresses that fit is difficult. This fits perfectly. The only thing I'm a little sad about is it goes just to my feet. So perfect for flats or sandles but I love my wedge heels so I do wish it was longer for that.
customer_reviews.author: Alysa Rae Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Used as a maternity Dress...
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this to be used as a maternity dress for my baby shower. I was 8 months pregnant, 5'1, and 173lbs with twins. My torso is very small so this dress complemented my baby belly nicely. Me being 5'1 this dress drags on the floor and covers my feet. I would like to purchase this again next summer! Really nice material for this hot humid weather we have.
customer_reviews.author: Aquatic Ma

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: 220 lbs, 5'6, usually wear size 16 ordered an exlg first too big reordered a lg fit perfectly. Still comfortabel w room to move. Nice material vers Nice dress Will order more
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Too bad because the print and length were great
customer_reviews.text: Bottom was completly see through. Too bad because the print and length were great. Unless you want to wear a slip- buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: AshnOK

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: so this is pretty, but kind of a weird fit for me. it’s a little hard to tell in the pics, but i don’t think the waist is up high enough so it makes my hips look huge in a bad way. and the neckline isn’t low enough for my liking, i feel a bit too modest. also the skirt material is kind of weird, it almost looks like satin. super comfy, though. i’m usually a medium/large in dresses and the large fits well by normal standards, i think a medium would maybe work as well since it’s pretty stretchy. i’m returning it because i’m not in love, but i do think this will work for most people.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best clothing purchase this summer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size XL, and 5'6" and 185 pounds with a thick waist and larger chest. It fits like a dream... Soft, breathable, and very comfortable. Just the right amount of stretch. Fabric is lightweight but not see-through. Hits just below my ankles. And the best point for me is that body odors don't cling to the fabric (as with some clothing), so it's not stinky at the end of day. I can actually hang it up, air it out, and wear it a few more times before washing!
customer_reviews.author: Bonni Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a cruise, I wanted something casual and lightweight and it didn't disappoint. I got so many compliments from strangers. I'm only 5'1, so I was a little worried about the length being too long, especially since I ordered a larger size, so it was just a little bit too long, but not to the point where it got in my way or dragged on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Caseypagez

customer_reviews.title: Love this dress!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look and feel of this dress. The pattern is gorgeous. In fact I ordered two more in a different style. It is long. Jus like description states. I’m 5”1 so it hits the floor. So I ordered 3in wedges jus like it suggested. Only downside is care instructions which is hand wash and hang dry or lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Material sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is nothing more than a nonbreathable, polyester dress. Looks pretty but the material feels cheap and will sweat you on a warm day. No lady wants that!
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Coral top maxi dress
customer_reviews.text: The dress is comfortable because it is stretchy in the bodice and the skirt flows gently. The waistline is odd on me. It’s too long to be empire, too short to be at natural waist and the elastic is a bit uncomfortable. I like the color of the print with the solid top. I’ll likely enjoy wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: A waistline that is finally not too high!
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to find a dress with a waistline that fits, they are always too high and make me look heavier than I already am. This dress hits my waistline PERFECTLY and isn't too long as other dresses I've ordered. I don't have to get hem altered! It is so flattering on my short body, I bought a MEDIUM instead of my usual Large and I'm glad I did. The medium fits perfectly. I love this dress, I want to order different colors but they're out of Medium in different colors. Hope to get more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Way to long if you are under 5'3"
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this dress and was soo excited when it arrived. Tried it on and was disappointed! I am 5'1" 120lbs and ordered a small. This dress was way to long on me. I even if I tied it up on the side and it was still too long. The top part of the dress was also very thin, which was also disappointing. The bottom was not only too long but it is wide, which made me look a lot bigger than 120 lbs! I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jehnika

customer_reviews.title: Slim
customer_reviews.text: The material is really soft and nice, but the fit.... was awful. The top of this dress fit just fine, but the skirt was REALLY slim and clingy and overall unflattering. If you don't have curves, lumps or bumps you might be ok. This isn't my thing... Goodbye, dress!
customer_reviews.author: H. Stone

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL dresses! The fit is perfect and super flattering. High quality material, not see through, no slip needed. The chest fits great and the waist hits at just the right spot. I ordered three more after my first one arrived! I’m 5’7” 155lbs and wear between a size 6-8. I ordered the medium and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Stay@Home Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great Dress!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress! Most maxis I have to pay to get altered because they are too long but this one was the perfect length to wear with small wedge sandals! I plan to purchase more! I ordered it in May but wore it today for the first time as I wasn’t able to walk the first 5.5 months of the year and just recently started being able to wear shoes other than my tennis shoes with my orthotic (I have a leg length discrepancy so have to have shoes altered). I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Deg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dress!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and 165lb, and I bought the Medium, and it fits perfectly! I wore this dress Sunday to a festival, and it falls at just the right length (though I did pick it up to go up/down stairs a bit). It is soooo comfortable and flattering - it's the softest fabric and it's thick enough to not be see-through, but still light enough to wear in the 100 degree weather. I am in love with this dress and will probably order some more!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Beale

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is pretty roomy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large but am returning for a medium. I am 5'6", 155 lb and wear 8-10 in pants and 34G in bras (which is why I got the large). The quality was good and I liked the cut, but it was too loose and a touch too long (but not dragging on the ground). The description says the medium is .8" shorter which should work for me. The large more than accommodated my chest so I think the medium will be fine in that respect. I like that the stretchy fabric on top is fairly thick and not see-through.
customer_reviews.author: Kate T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty! but the fabric is too thin
customer_reviews.text: I saw this advertised on an Amazon sponsored post on Facebook. It's totally cute! It fits my 5'8" 180lb frame without being clingy or skin tight. The length is perfect for a maxi dress, and the colors are great! I'd have kept it if the fabric wasn't so thin though. You can kinda see through the skirt when you hold it up to the light, so I'd suggest wearing a slip underneath it.
customer_reviews.author: chicagotodetroit

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 - great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I don’t often purchase clothes online but decided to roll the dice on this one since I was crunched for time. I’m really happy I did. I purchased 3 different prints of this dress and I love them. Fit: size is accurate and fits great Fabric: great quality and not see through (a lot of dresses these days are) Fashion: really great prints, I got heaps of compliments Go ahead, worth the purchase (and super cute with a denim jacket if it’s on the chilly side)
customer_reviews.author: KiMi

customer_reviews.title: Fits True to Size!
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought clothes through Amazon before because I'm always iffy about the quality and sizing. I couldn't help but buy this dress because of how cute it it! This is one of my first clothing purchase and I'm so happy with it. I am 5"6 and the medium size fit me perfect both length and width. The material is not cheap either! Cute summer dress.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great dress for pear shapes!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually very surprised by this dress! I was looking for a maxi dress that would actually fit and flatter my pear shape, and this one looks and feels great! I was pleased with the quality of the fabric and the silky smooth feel of the skirt. I think it’s a little shorter than I would like it, but it will look great with sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Hucks

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Im 5ft 140lbs. Body measurements: 37 bust, 33 waist and 44 hips. Dress size ordered: Small. The dress fits just right in all the right places. I read the reviews and was confused as to which size to get due to my height and measurements so I took a shot and got a small... and it was the best choice. I included 2 pictures: one normal standing and the other on my tiptoes for reference. Love the dress and will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and Cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL size and it fits well. I've been after a dress that fits my chest but DOESN'T make me look pregnant. Most dresses if its larger in chest the waist has no shape. This dress is very comfy and it looks cute. For reference, I am 5'4", have a DD/DDD chest and weigh about 200lbs. The only con is it's long and I have to pick it up s little when I walk. Most dresses do this though since I have short legs.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Marie Bosket

customer_reviews.title: Compliments everytime
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments everytime I wear this dress. Everyone is always shocked when I tell them I bought it on Amazon for under $30. I am 5' 7" and it's very flattering, the top half cinches a little below my chest area so that the rest of the dress flows and does not show or accentuate my pouch of a stomach. I bought it in two colors, but the one that is black on to and has beige on the bottom is the one I like the most and the one that gets the most compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Dress
customer_reviews.text: This dress fit very well, even though if I wanted to wear it with flats I would have to hem it. The fabric on the top is a nice quality t-shirt fabric. The bottom is a soft, very comfortable stretchy knit. The knit on the bottom is heavy enough to keep it from being see-through. It washes & dries well. It's a great summer dress or perfect for cooler weather with a sweater or jacket. I plan to order another color.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy A

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very stretchy which I love. Ordered for my baby shower I’m currently 29 weeks pregnant and I ordered a size small as I didn’t want it too long were of trip. Came perfect and surprisingly it fit great with it being a small. I did however have to wear a black tank top as when the sun hit you get kinda see through the top part but for the price I don’t mind. For size reference I’m 5’3 and currently 29 weeks making about 170 in weight.
customer_reviews.author: lillie

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable perfect length to wear with flip-flops also the color ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable perfect length to wear with flip-flops also the color is accurate as shown in the pictures I got the turquoise top with the black and white print bottom and I really like it it's so comfortable the top is double fabric so you can't see through it it's perfect and it's nice and light for summertime I definitely have two or three of the same dress in different colors
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I rarely ever wear dresses, but this one I will definitely wear!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a work party in early summer. I was nervous because I normally don't look good in maxi dresses. I'm 5'5 and 160lbs and a 31 inch waist so I was skeptical about buying a medium but it fits PERFECT. It brushes the top of my feet so I can wear flats if I want. I just ordered 2 more in different colors/patterns. It's stretchy everywhere but also thick enough that you can't see through it. As a person who wears a dress MAYBE once a year, the fact that I just ordered 2 more should tell you something. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: Longer than expected; low-quality material
customer_reviews.text: The dress itself is beautiful, but it was longer and larger than I expected (I'm 5'3" and about 140 lbs, and the S was too large). In addition, the fabric feels very thin and like it won't last. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Cute print
customer_reviews.text: Cute print and nice length. Would definitely order a size or 2 up. I ordered up one size and it was still slightly smaller than what I would like. More empire waist looking, not like how it looks on the model.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Slimming.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this dress and I will be ordering another one ASAP! Material is soft and flowy. I am a 38DD and chunky through the middle. I ordered a large it it is so slimming. I have not washed to see how it holds up, but I highly recommend! Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits in all the right places
customer_reviews.text: This dress couldn’t have been more perfect. I had high hopes given the reviews and photos. When taken out of the packaging I was a bit skeptical with the material but I was completely wrong. The top part covers and stretches in all the right places. I hate my armpit area and it covers. I have a very large bust and have difficulties finding tops & even more so dressses to fit me and it stretches so beautifully. The body part contours to every curve and does not cling thank goodness (which I fear with dresses). I bought this for my 30th birthday and Now I’m just tempted to buy more in different colors I can’t wait!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Soho

customer_reviews.title: Just Right! I’ll probably buy another...
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than expected. Very nice quality, well made, lovely detail, fabric is stretchy and flowy. Very forgiving. Given what I read, I bought a large, which is bigger than I normally would buy. Could have easily gotten away with a medium. The length is a little long for me but I bunched up some fabric on the left side with a rubber band, creating a rose effect. It does the trick and actually adds a bit of pizazz to the dress. I’m 5’4”, 125 lbs. 34DDD.
customer_reviews.author: thorsten

customer_reviews.title: good dress
customer_reviews.text: The material is really good and very comfortable, but it was a bit smaller than expected. I had bought an XL coz that's what I normally order. Also the top isn't as long as shown here. It ends right under the bust. Not as flowy as expected, it just had a straight cut, but still a very good dress.
customer_reviews.author: Saniha

customer_reviews.title: Great dress!
customer_reviews.text: I love this dress. It's so comfortable. I've washed it several times and it's like new every time. I do think the fit is a little small, at least in the top. I ordered a large and while it fits fine, I think an XL may have given me a little room around in the chest area (34D, so not huge boobs) Of course, there's no real way to know without ordering an XL for comparison. I'm 5'3" and the length is all the way to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lr74

customer_reviews.title: Love these dresses!
customer_reviews.text: I’m fairly picky about clothing, but I absolutely love these dresses! I own 2 so far and will definitely be purchasing more. I’m 5’6” 165lbs and a medium fits perfectly. Not too tight, not too lose or long. Extremely well made and hold up great in the wash. The material is so soft, but not too thin. Buy this dress!
customer_reviews.author: C8R9H

customer_reviews.title: True to size, fits comfortably loose. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: At no fault of this gorgeous dress, I ordered a size larger wanting a loose fit. I could have ordered an xl and still enjoyed a looser fitting dress. Here in SW Texas, it is wildly hot, still wanting a longer maxi dress for any occassion, I am so happy as this has exceeded my hopes. It has great movement and it makes me feel pretty. Yay! Worth your trying it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Nature's Minion

customer_reviews.title: Complements abound in this dress!!
customer_reviews.text: I am short so I need to wear heels with this. But no worries. The complements I get with this dress every time a wear it, must be at least 5-10 a day. It’s sooooo cozy and looks great. I purchased a few more in different patterns. All get a bunch of compliments. I have seriously had a bunch of people stop me in the store to tell me they love this dress!!! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: MissMegP

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This dress is super cute and fit perfectly! It always used to be the case that maxi dresses were excessively long, but this one was just the perfect length for me (5'5"). No heels required! The top is made out of a very soft t-shirt fabric that feels nice. I'm less excited about the material the skirt is made out of, and it is semi see-through when stretched a bit, but it isn't really an issue I don't think since the skirt isn't normally in a stretched position. It looks really great with a belt tied around the waist! I wasn't expecting much for the price, but was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: jlynn08

customer_reviews.title: So nice, I bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: Had this dress in my shopping cart for months and finally took a chance and bought it. (It is so hard buying clothes online without seeing the fit and quality in person.) Am SO glad I did. Great quality fabric and construction. Fit was perfect. (Am 5’7”, a little over 200lb. XL worked great - nice hang, no tightness at all.) Love the color options - I mix and match with several cardigans I have. I actually bought a second dress because I liked the first so much. I get compliments every time I wear them. If you like maxi dresses, get one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Txmusicmom

customer_reviews.title: Flowy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would wear a maxi dress, let along one with floral print. I tried it on and actually didn't really like it, however I had someone else give me a second opinion and they told me they liked it on me so I decided to keep it and give it a chance. After wearing it for work one day I feel in love! It is lightweight and breathable. I was comfortable all day and I felt that I was dressed up enough for work while also having a summer feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable dress. The material on the bottom portion is slightly see-through so I will probably wear a slip or nude colored thong. The neckline is modest and does not reveal anything when leaning forward. The arm holes are just the right size: not too small that it restricts arm movement and not too large that my bra shows. I paired it with a jean jacket and it looks great! Looking forward to warmer weather so I can wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer Dress
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this dress and the colors!!! Will have to purchase this summer in other colors. I was scared about getting this because i’m a hippy 5’5, 165, but I believe not having pockets help (which i appreciated). Perfect for and wear for work or play!!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: I am typically a solid medium and I could have sworn I ordered this dress in a medium, but apparently I ordered a small. The small fits great!! I have the same dress (different pattern) arriving later in a medium, so I will update the differences. I was very bummed when I saw the "S" on the tag, but I am not returning it due to the fact that it fits perfect. I am 5'3" around 160lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Haan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comforable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about which size to order; normally I would go for a large. The recommendations were to go with a size medium, so I did, and it fits perfect! I'm 5'5" tall, weigh around 140lbs, and measurements are 34dd-30-35. The dress is very soft stretchy material that isn't too tight or too loose. It's very thin & lightweight, but not see-thru, and was great for yesterday's 88 degree weather! It is more comfortable than I imagined it'd be. It's my new favorite summer/spring/fall dress!! I wish I bought this sooner!! I will probably be ordering other prints/colors in this dress. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Cute great fitting dress.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and fits great. Happy that the bottom is made with a stretchy material that will wear nicely. Can't wait to wear this one out to dinner! Update: loved this dress SO Much I ordered it in the white/blue and pink/teal combos!! Each is just as lovely and comfy. I also ordered my mom the real/black combo since she loved my dresses so much. Hers fit perfectly too and we wear different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Justpeachy85

customer_reviews.title: Perfect maxi dress!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is great! I purchased two of them in different patterns. It wears well and is so comfortable! My only issue is that I'm at 36C and it comes down a little lower than what I would like. Larger chested people may not have this problem. Regardless, I love this dress!!!!! I'm 5'8" and it comes to the floor. Perfect! I do wear it with a belt.
customer_reviews.author: PCF

customer_reviews.title: Love love love! Will buy more.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’2” 115ish and absolutely love this dress!!! I got a small and it fits perfectly. Paired with a jean jacket and some flip flops it was a perfect spring dress for Easter! I plan to order more. The chest material is cloth and it’s soft. The skirt part has more of a silky feel! Perfectly breezy for the hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Preteen niece loves her dress!👗
customer_reviews.text: My 12 y/o niece loves her dress. She is a tall, slim athletic build, up and down build. She is 5’3 & 98lbs. The dress is to her feet but it will work for a growing preteen. XS size fits her perfectly just a bit long but still works.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes G.

customer_reviews.title: Material is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Love this dress. SUPER comfortable and airy. I have gotten so many compliments on this dress. I am 5'3 and only have to wear a small heel but could probably wear flats and not walk on it. I got a small, again I'm 5'3 and 140lbs and it fits perfect not to tight or big. Material isn't thin or hot will buy in another color
customer_reviews.author: anastasia hood

customer_reviews.title: Great Dress
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dress to wear to work and church. It is a good soft material and looks great on my figure. The only real problem that I've had with it is the length. I am 5"3' and the dress is jus the slightest bit too long, which causes me to trip on it from time to time. This can be fixed by wearing shoes that elevate your height just a bit (not necessarily heels). Overall, a good product and is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Teater

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! You’ll want them in all the colors!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these maxis!! This is my 4th one at this point. They’re extremely comfortable and flattering. They’ve been helping me hide the weigh I gained in quarantine. Also I love that they’re light weight! I live in south Florida and it’s unbelievably hot so these are great for that! Plus you can dress them up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen H Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Decent Dress for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This dress in the coral color is pretty, but not near as bright colored as it shows online. It’s more or a dull coral. The top is a little on the thin side and shows every part of my nude colored bra. Fits as expected. I bought a L and an XL, I am typically a Large and 5’8’’. Length is a tad short for my liking and not a big difference in the L vs XL. I will return one, just haven’t decided on which one, yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: The dress I bought is beautiful, but it runs SMALL. I expected it to be somewhat float from the empire waist, but instead, I look like I'm pregnant with a baby elephant. I threw in a loose kimono-style sheet jacket in black to cover my tum and it works for me, but I'm still a bit disappointed. However, this dress make my rack look outstanding (literalky) so maybe it's a trade-off.
customer_reviews.author: S. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Too short for taller women
customer_reviews.text: I was satisfied with the quality of this dress, but it was too short on me, so I'm returning it. I am 5'7" and it was about an inch too short to wear with flats. (I bought a small, which is my usual size.) Also, the waist was in a weird spot on me: lower than an empire waist but higher than my natural waist. It was not particularly flattering. I bought black/taupe and mint/black. As one other reviewer mentioned, the mint is absolutely not mint. It's sky blue. There is nothing green about it. Looks fine if you like sky blue though.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Nice dress
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice dress, pleasantly surprised because it was inexpensive. It fits well and the colors are vibrant. I got the floral print with peach/coral on the top. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried this dress on and it is very comfortable, fits well and I expect it to be enjoyed while visiting Florida. I plan to wear it around the beach and out to eat. The length is a little long, but I’m 5’4” and that happens sometimes. With some heels it should be ok, but looks great with flip flops.
customer_reviews.author: comfortfoot

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay - not in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat brutal about this dress. I purchased the aqua & black/white dress in a large. I normally wear a 12-14, am a 38C and 5'5". I did like that the top portion of the dress was thicker and not see thru at all. However, the lower half of the dress was much thinner and more clingy - it was just odd. I am going to return it because I am not in love with it and debating about ordering a XL. Maybe a different fit will win me over.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Oakes

customer_reviews.title: GET A SIZE LARGER THAN U NORMALLY WEAR
customer_reviews.text: I ALWAYS WEAR A MEDIUM BUT THIS WAS TOO SMALL THRU CHEST AND WAIST AREA. I WOULD LIKE TO RETURN BUT I WILL HAVE TO PAY FOR SHIPPING SO I WILL JUST WEAR IT AROUND THE HOUSE.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered several of these already lol. I'm 5'2, size 3/4 in dresses, 34DD, and got a size small. It's PERFECT. It hits the floor by about half an inch or so, it's a little long on me but I expect that with my height. It's VERY comfortable and stretchy. It's very flattering! I love it!! Very nice material also, not thin or see through.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not for short torsos
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" with a large bust and short torso. The dress was a perfect length, it fell to the tops of my feet, but the waist cuts me right in half not far below my bust. It's a very comfortable dress and easy to wear, but I found myself wishing the waist fell just a bit lower.
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: So. Freaking. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This dress was PERFECT! I ordered it last minute for an event and was nervous it wouldn't fit correctly, but it was perfect and true to size. The top is not see through, which was definitely my biggest concern. It's lightweight, breathable material that didn't feel too heavy (and I wore it in 90 degree heat). Definitely will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Insanely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously insanely comfortable and beautiful. I needed a a maxi for my trip to Abu Dhabi, and this far exceeded my expectations. It's now one of my favorite go-to maxis. Fit perfectly. I wear a full size 6 normally, and the small was perfect. It's also very flattering and forgiving if you need it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Cristen R Autry

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I have so many of these (4) and I get compliments on how beautiful they are. They are perfect for summer and spring and I can even have a lazy day and wear it to work with a mini cardigan. It is long and could snag, but I wear flats and my actual size is 5 3. I am a smedium because I typically have a small on top and medium on bottom, if you are the same order smaller. A medium was too large for me.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Holder

customer_reviews.title: XS for taller ladies- advice
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy, top fits like a glove (in a good way). Only issue is it’s a tad on the short side. I’m 5’7, 120 lbs, (26 inch waist, 38 inch hips, a 30DD) and the XS was perfect except I wish it was about a half an inch longer. If you’re taller than 5’7 the XS will not work for you and there is not enough room in the hem to let it out. If you’re any taller than 5’6 you’ll only be able to wear the dress with flats. Haven’t washed it yet but will definitely not risk drying it in case it shrinks up. I recommend line drying.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Far better than expected!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely dress! I’m petite 5’3 and I was concerned with the length of this dress, however it fit perfectly!!! I like the look of a maxi dress and that’s how it wears on me. The material is comfortable and the colors are beautiful. I will absolutely order another dress. Pricing was very fair for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this dress!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'2" & 170pds. The xlg fit me perfectly. The length is just right, the armholes aren't too big, the fabric is soft and comfortable. I own 3 of these dresses. Side note: I also ordered a short-sleeved version of this dress, from the same mfgr. and the waist sits much higher and wasn't nearly as flattering.
customer_reviews.author: azbeachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Comfy summer dress
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this dress. I bought the orange one and this one. They wash beautiful and are great summer dresses. I am 5'5 and 129 lbs and a M fits great. I have already washed it and I hung it to dry and comes out wonderful. No ironing! Great value for the price! I was surprised. May see about buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great dress!!
customer_reviews.text: So, first..I just got the dress and tried it on so I haven’t worn it out of the house. That being said, it’s beautiful! It’s floor length (I’m 5’4) and flows nicely. I did go a size up than my usual since I don’t like things clinging to me. That was a good decision. The material is really nice. I’ll try to update after I wear it to my occasion. *Update: I wore it to my daughters graduation and I love it..it was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Gmack

customer_reviews.title: The colors are perfect and the proper blend of print/solid
customer_reviews.text: I wore the navy with print today and have gotten compliments all day. The colors are perfect and the proper blend of print/solid. It is so comfortable AND FLATTERING. (I am 5'5" and super-hourglass shaped) No clinging where it should not, and flowing where it should be. I will be ordering other colors. The XXL does not gap or expose undergarments at arm holes. I might hem it an inch, but with heeled sandals it has been fine all day, even on steps. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Dara W.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work with a long torso
customer_reviews.text: I wish this dress worked for me. I have a long torso and the spot where the tank and skirt connected hit me at a weird spot. If I tried to pull it down a bit, the tank pulled too tight and showed under my arms. I returned this. The material was nice tho and the pattern on the skirt was beautiful! It just didn’t lay right on me
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Summer dress! Beautiful, well made and fit as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase and worth the buy! Looks exactly like photo. Fits as expected and so beautiful. Material is very nice. Not thin and not too heavy or see through. Just right for Summer or dressing up for an event. Beautiful, classy and modestly flattering Buyer Purchased: Size Small Buyer: 118lbs 5'6 Athletic Build Color Purchased: Black Top with Floral design bottom Type: Sleeveless Long Maxi Dress
customer_reviews.author: O So Hap E

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality. Beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this dress. The material is a much better quality than I expected, but other reviewers had mentioned the same thing. Not a lie! I normally wear petite, so I had the dress professionally altered to just above my feet so it wouldn’t drag. Otherwise, id have to wear heels or wedges every time with the dress. I’m 5’1 and 170lbs. The Large was perfect. A little loose on top even though I’m a 38 D, but again, I normally buy petite. Overall, fantastic buy!! I could even use this as a maternity dress down the line. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Bird

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for one day!
customer_reviews.text: It is cute but it doesn't hold up very wel ln while wearing it or after washing...I wore this to a party and when I was holding my daughter and her rubbing up against me all the time I noticed a bunch of fuzzy all over the dress and they didn't come out! Not to sure if I would recommend although it is very cute if you want to just get one wear out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different colors are different types of dresses.
customer_reviews.text: I had received the navy multi as a birthday gift and loved it so much u ordered the black in the same size. The black dress fit completely differently and was not true to size. It was smaller. The dress is douable, so I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dubin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got a 2X because I got this last minute. I’m 219 and 3 months post partum. Due to covid, I can’t try on any dresses - so I got this size. I probably could have gotten an XL and been fine. It was a bit loose on me. But I was comfortable and it looked great at my uncle’s wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and really comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The quality is good for the price and its super comfy... I'm 5'4" and it hits me near the bottom of my ankle....I was expecting the small to be too big because women's size small normally is on me but the fit is perfect! The arm holes and neckline are modest- doesnt show bra or cleavage.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great dress, very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm honestly really impressed. The dress fit great, the material was very nice and not thin at all, and it was very comfortable. I purchased it to wear at my baby shower and I was really happy with the dress itself, just not how I looked in it. Had nothing to do with the dress itself, just my very pregnant self and low self-esteem so I didnt end up wearing it. Highly recommend the dress though!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

product_meta.title: Zattcas Womens Summer Contrast Sleeveless Tank Top Floral Print Maxi Dress
feature_bullets: Unique Design: Long dresses with damask printed skirt,contrast solid tank top, flattering on your body! Great birthday gift for friends, can also be used as a maternity maxi dress
Features: Sleeveless simple maxi dress with scoop neckline,elastic in the waist to make a comfortable fit.You can throw on a jacket easily when it's too chilly in the fall
Occasion:Wear it with necklace and wedges,or throw on a belt,great floral maxi dress for the coming summer beach vacation

Runs True to US Size: Height 5'3" to 5'6",dress will brush the floor.Height 5'7" to 5'8",It will hit at your ankle.Height 5'1" to 5'2",you need to hem it or with 3" wedges.Model is 5'4", size 4, 34B and wearing a small,dress just above her feet

Prime and Free Returns: All womens dresses in our store are fulfilled by Amazon and eligible for Free return.Pls try it freely and just order your normal size or choose based on Bust (Measure with bra): X-Small/US 0-2,Small/US 4-6 ,Medium/US 8-10,Large/US 12-14,X-Large/US 16-18,XX-Large/US 20-22
